option.t-att-selected: country.id == int(country_id) if country_id else country.id == partner.country_id.id

input.name: pm_id
input.t-att-checked: acquirers_count==1 and pms_count==0 or acquirers[0] == acq

input.name: pm_id
input.t-att-checked: acquirers_count==1 and pms_count==0 or acquirers[0] == acq

div.t-attf-class: card-footer {{'d-none' if(acquirers_count > 1 and pms_count==0 and acquirers[0]!=acq) else 'd-none' if pms_count >0 else ''}}

button.t-if: mode == 'manage' and list(filter(lambda x: x.payment_flow == 's2s', acquirers))
button.class: float-right btn btn-primary btn-lg mb8 mt8

t.t-if: not verify_validity or (pm.acquirer_id.check_validity and pm.verified) or not pm.acquirer_id.check_validity

i.title: This payment method is verified by our system.
